A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would say about half of this films runtime does nothing to advance the plot\, and is made irrelevant shortly after happening. Finn and Roses trip to the gambling planet was a particularly weird detraction from the main plot. The other main I have is that the villains don't evoke any real fear or strong emotions from me. They are weak and incompetent unlike Darth Vader\, Boba Fett or Sidious. I think the characters and are interesting in and of themselves but unfortunately the situations they are placed into are mostly bland and uninteresting.
